item.title: extracurriculars
item.description: Student Organizations Yale Daily News: Opinion Editor & President of the Editorial Board (2022-23), Opinion Staff Columnist (2021-22) Yale Political Union: Vice President (2022), Treasurer (2021-22) Salus Populi Foundation: Founding Board Member (2022-23) Yale Undergraduate Quantum Computing Club: Founding Board Member, Director of Invited Talks (2021) Yale Radio: Radio Show Host (2022-23) Research Lowenstein Project @ Yale Law School: Student Researcher (2022-23) Yale Department of Political Science: Research Assistant in International Security (2021-22)
item.content:encoded:
Student Organizations

  • Yale Daily News: Opinion Editor & President of the Editorial Board (2022-23), Opinion Staff Columnist (2021-22)
  • Yale Political Union: Vice President (2022), Treasurer (2021-22)
  • Salus Populi Foundation: Founding Board Member (2022-23)
  • Yale Undergraduate Quantum Computing Club: Founding Board Member, Director of Invited Talks (2021)
  • Yale Radio: Radio Show Host (2022-23)

Research

  • Lowenstein Project @ Yale Law School: Student Researcher (2022-23)

  • Yale Department of Political Science: Research Assistant in International Security (2021-22)

  • YSArch Lab: Undergraduate Researcher (2020-21)
